name: Dark Fruit And Creamy Cheese
keywords: dessert, figs, fromage blanc, plum, gluten-free, low-fat, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fromage blanc (fat-free white cheese, sold in cheese shops)
12 Italian prune plums, pitted and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the fromage blanc and yogurt together in a bowl until very smooth. Sweeten the mixture with two tablespoons of the honey.
Spoon the cheese and yogurt mixture into the middle of a shallow serving dish. Allow a border of about two inches all around.
Arrange the plums, figs and berries around the cheese mixture. Drizzle with honey and serve.
